profile:
Homes By Jager was started, in June 2016, by Stuart Jager and his wife Kevan Jager. They started the company in hopes of being able to provide the Georgian Bay area with amazing, affordable, renovations and new home builds.

Stuart started working in construction while he was still in high school. When Stuart graduated, in 2005, he joined the Canadian Armed Forces. Stuarts passion for construction has never wavered and he was able to obtain his general contractors license, in the province of Alberta, in 2006. Stuart has worked, throughout the last 10 years, under other general contractors to keep up his knowledge, skills, and learn new ways to manage projects.

While Stuarts career in the armed forces is coming to a close, his desire to work and serve the community still drives him to succeed.

The entire Homes By Jager team would be proud, and honoured, to help you with your next renovation or new home build.

We are located in the town of Meaford, only 20 minutes from Owen Sound or Collingwood.

Please contact us with inquiries.
